about_the_game:
Arisen Force: Vonimir is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels ,it combines the engaging RPG adventure storyline with the Stylish Actional combat experience.We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .

Features

  • A magnificent fantasy world for players to explore, develop and other interesting experiences.

  • Exquisite HD pixel style and ingenuity hand-painted, experience picturesque play art style.

  • From remote villages to magnificent castles, from desolate deserts to silver ice sheets, enjoy the vast and distinctive landscapes.

  • In a chaotic world, interact with all forces and write your own epic chapter.

  • Smooth action strategy combat with rich skill modules,and it can instantly switch teammate anytime,

  • challenging the World BOSS , the ultimate path will always be left to the Warriors.

  • More than eight kinds of unique weapon modules,it will continue to be enriched with the follow-up development.

  • A free kit system of weapons and skills,it's Ok to be a mage wielding a giant sword, or a hunter who tanks the enemy, interesting and powerful.

  • Rescue and recruit teammates, build them with unique equipment and skills for your exclusive forces.

  • In addition to adventure, there are taverns, forging, trade and other activities as travel seasoning.

  • On the basis of the world outlook, we add some linked characters makes the game journey more interesting and full of surprises.
detailed_description:
Arisen Force: Vonimir is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels ,it combines the engaging RPG adventure storyline with the Stylish Actional combat experience.We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .

Features

  • A magnificent fantasy world for players to explore, develop and other interesting experiences.

  • Exquisite HD pixel style and ingenuity hand-painted, experience picturesque play art style.

  • From remote villages to magnificent castles, from desolate deserts to silver ice sheets, enjoy the vast and distinctive landscapes.

  • In a chaotic world, interact with all forces and write your own epic chapter.

  • Smooth action strategy combat with rich skill modules,and it can instantly switch teammate anytime,

  • challenging the World BOSS , the ultimate path will always be left to the Warriors.

  • More than eight kinds of unique weapon modules,it will continue to be enriched with the follow-up development.

  • A free kit system of weapons and skills,it's Ok to be a mage wielding a giant sword, or a hunter who tanks the enemy, interesting and powerful.

  • Rescue and recruit teammates, build them with unique equipment and skills for your exclusive forces.

  • In addition to adventure, there are taverns, forging, trade and other activities as travel seasoning.

  • On the basis of the world outlook, we add some linked characters makes the game journey more interesting and full of surprises.

name: Arisen Force: Vonimir

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / Intel® Arc™ A750 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Arisen Force: Vonimir" is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels ,it combines the engaging RPG adventure story with the Stylish Action combat experience.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
